interpretation: The Snowman card represents a time of joy and playfulness. It suggests the need to embrace your inner child and find the fun in life. The card can also signify a temporary situation, like the melting of a snowman, so enjoy the moment while it lasts. Keywords associated with this card include winter, holiday spirit, innocence, and impermanence. The Snowman reminds us to appreciate the fleeting moments of happiness in our lives and to find joy in the present.
